level.text: The H Street Moratorium Zone shall consist of both sides of the street on H Street, N.E., between and including the 700 block of H Street, N.E., and the 1400 block of H Street, N.E.

Within the H Street Moratorium Zone, a licensee under an off-premises retailer’s license, class A or B, shall not sell, give, offer, expose for sale, or deliver either: (1) an individual container of beer, malt liquor, or ale; or, (2) spirits (liquor) in sizes of half-pint or smaller.

Within the H Street Moratorium Zone, a licensee under an off-premises retailer’s license, class A or B, shall not divide a manufacturer’s package of more than one container of beer, malt liquor, or ale, to sell an individual container of the package.
This section shall apply to new or transferred class A or B retailer’s licenses issued during the moratorium period within the H Street Moratorium Zone.
The section shall expire on August 23, 2010.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 4309 (April 30, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12991 (December 26, 2008).
